fitness_activities.name: Morning Dumbbell Workout
fitness_activities.description: A comprehensive upper body strength training session using various dumbbell exercises to build muscle and improve overall fitness.
instructions: Finish with 3 sets of 8 dumbbell curls

fitness_activities.name: Tennis Match Training
fitness_activities.description: An intensive tennis training session focusing on technique, agility, and cardiovascular endurance through various drills and practice matches.
instructions: Work on serve technique for 15 minutes

fitness_activities.name: Swimming Endurance Session
fitness_activities.description: A focused swimming workout designed to improve cardiovascular fitness, technique, and endurance through various swimming strokes and drills.

fitness_activities.name: Dumbbell HIIT Circuit
fitness_activities.description: A high-intensity interval training session using dumbbells to maximize calorie burn and improve both strength and cardiovascular fitness.
instructions: Exercises: dumbbell thrusters, renegade rows, goblet squats

fitness_activities.name: Swimming Technique Clinic
fitness_activities.description: A technical swimming session focused on improving stroke efficiency, breathing technique, and overall swimming performance through targeted drills.
instructions: Work on stroke technique for 15 minutes
Use pull buoy for arm-focused swimming
